[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 316570759 by [[Special:Contributions/71.57.221.161|71.57.221.161]] ([[User talk:71.57.221.161|talk]])I think that will make a great addition, but we really already have too much [[wp:OR]] and need more content from [[wp:RS]
MMORPG is not an abreviation, it is an acronym
Big chunk of OR in the lead - been flagged a while. Dropped.
After fact-checking against the 2 sources, I am shifting to support of removal, and cutting the "MMORPG" coining and UO ref from the lead to talk.
delinking ISO style dates , Replaced: [[2007-02-17]] → 2007-02-17, using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]

[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 315889928 by [[Special:Contributions/AtomicDog1471|AtomicDog1471]] ([[User talk:AtomicDog1471|talk]])That is about MMORPG,not UO. Maybe discuss objections on the [[wp:talk]] page?
Removed unnecessary info about Ultima Online (Ultima Online is addressed in the history section below)
/* Player-created content */ advert out. It can have its own article if it needs one. ... and ... player-created content subsection seems an odd spot.

[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 312414311 by [[Special:Contributions/Francois77|Francois77]] ([[User talk:Francois77|talk]])Very weak notability. There are much more appropriate games to list if we are going to list more...
Dropping the WoW-most-popular bit... either this is illustrative and that isn't needed, or the remark doesn't belong here. Dropping my "dubious" flag based on the "it is illustrative" argument.
/* Console-based MMORPGs */ Dropped Phantasy Star Online - text says it isn't an MMORPG. Dropping unsourced future products [[wp:CRYSTAL]]. Wording and structure.
Written in a neutral style, with sources, that might be appropriate in the body as a discussion of rating numbers.
[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 310834615 by [[Special:Contributions/76.68.19.65|76.68.19.65]] ([[User talk:76.68.19.65|talk]])unexplained removal. [[wp:edit summary]] maybe

Date maintenance tags and general fixes
If I missed the basis for this in the body, my apologies... but this looks like a lot of OR in the lead.
refimprove - Flagging to help encourage leaving new [[wp:OR]] out... and to draw the attention of source-providers

/* Player Vs Enviroment & Player Vs Player */ No really... Solo play. Maybe a new section? Please [[wp:edit summaries]]. The detail on WoW belongs (and is) in the WoW article, rather than here. PvP is discussed thoroughly in the PvP article.
I know for a fact FFXI was sold, with hard drive, in the USA. Whether or not it was available in the US at launch, I do not know. Deleted an erronious sentence fragment.

Dropped "''[[Final Fantasy XIV]]'' will be released for both [[PlayStation 3]] and PC. Finally, [[CCP Games|CCP]] has announced a new hybrid MMO/FPS titled ''[[DUST 514]]'' which is being developed for current video game consoles." - all unsourced.
